item.title: Wide versus Narrow Data Format - Using R
item.description: This workflow explores wide and narrow data formats, identifies in which circumstances each is useful and how to easily convert data from one to the other and back again. Setup First up we need to extend base R by installing/loading some libraries. if (!require('ggplot2')) { install.packages('ggplot2') library('ggplot2') } if (!require('curl')) { install.packages('curl') library('curl') } if (!require('reshape2')) { install.packages('reshape2') library('reshape2') } Workflow - Library Statistics Let’s take the example of a hypothetical Library, and look at the statistics the front desk might collect.
